column11:
Several sections
of the pipeline
(both Gl and

HDPE ) have
been broken
due to the force
of the
floodwaters.
Soil erosion has
exposed large
sections of the
pipeline,
increasing the
risk of further
damage and
contamination.
Many pipeline
joints have been
displaced,
causing leaks
and reducing
the system's
overall
efficiency.
Supporting
structures,
including
pipeline
supporting
pillars, have
been damaged
or washed
away.
Date
13/07/2024
